item.title: 「SOL Version of MicroStrategy」 Upexi's Holdings Surpass 2 Million SOL, July's Increase Exceeds 1.26 Million SOL
item.description: On August 5th, the holdings of Solana Treasury Company Upexi exceeded 2 million SOL. The current total value reached $334 million. In July, Upexi completed a $200 million financing round and acquired more than 1.26 million SOL, resulting in a 172% increase in its managed assets.

item.title: The final value of the July U.S. Markit Services PMI was 55.7, compared to an expected 55.2.
item.description: On August 5th: The ultimate value of the US July Markit Services PMI came in at 55.7. The expected value was 55.2, and the previous value was also 55.2. (Xinhua Finance)

item.title: A whale has further increased their short position to 50,000 ETH, liquidation price $3764
item.description: On August 5th, as monitored by EmberCN, after partially liquidating his position, the [Four-time ETH Whale with a 75% Win Rate] has reopened his short position in ETH to 50,000 ETH (180 million USD).His previous 50,000 ETH short position, which was partially liquidated last night and in the early morning, had dropped to 24,000 ETH. He then began to sequentially withdraw ETH and ARB from WhiteBIT and Kucoin, sell them on-chain for 7.21 million USDC, and transfer them to Hyperliquid to continue adding to his short position in ETH.Currently, after several additional positions, his short position in ETH has returned to 50,000 ETH (180 million USD) with an entry price of 3639 USD and a liquidation price of 3764 USD.

item.title: In July, the Ethereum market saw a demand of 3 million ETH, half of which came from the Ethereum Reserve Company
item.description: On August 5th, according to Trader T, in July, the market demand for Ethereum amounted to 3 million units:· 50% originated from ETFs (with 78% coming from BlackRock);· 50% came from Ethereum reserve companies (with 41% from Bitmine and 16% from SharpLink).

item.title: JP Morgan: In the foreseeable future, people will tend to sell the US Dollar on rallies
item.description: On August 5th, "We have always been conducting trade within the context of American exceptionalism. The United States is undoubtedly the world's most powerful economy. In my opinion, the situation has undergone a change," stated Erik Nelson, the Global Foreign Exchange Strategist at Wells Fargo. "There are potential structural issues - such as the independence of the Fed and the quality of data, to name just a few. When it comes to the economic backdrop, all of these are heading in the wrong direction. In the foreseeable future, people will be inclined to sell the dollar during rallies." (FXStreet)

item.title: MYX Short-term Breakthrough $1.33, 24-hour Gain Expanded to 290%
item.description: On August 5th, based on HTX market data, MYX briefly rose above $1.33 and is currently trading at $1.2985. It has witnessed a 24-hour price increase of 290%, driving its market capitalization to $215 million.

item.title: US Stock Crypto Concept Stocks Experience Widespread Decline, Circle Down 3.83%
item.description: On August 5th, based on the market data from Rockflow, US stock cryptocurrency concept stocks generally declined. These include:- Sharplink Gaming dropped by 1.45%;- Circle decreased by 3.83%;- Strategy fell by 1.53%;- Coinbase declined by 3.44%;- HOOD fell by 0.58%.

item.title: U.S. Stock Market's Big Three Indexes Open Higher, Coinbase Drops Nearly 4%
item.description: On August 5th, when the U.S. stock market opened, the Dow increased by 0.06%, the S&P 500 rose by 0.1%, and the Nasdaq went up by 0.11%. Coinbase (COIN.O) dropped by nearly 4%. (FX168)

item.title: CleanSpark mined 671 Bitcoin in July, bringing its total holdings to 12,703 Bitcoin
item.description: On August 5th, the Bitcoin mining company CleanSpark disclosed its July 2025 operational data. The report indicates that the company mined 671 bitcoins during that month, and by the end of July, the total holdings reached 12,703 bitcoins.During this period, they sold 575.97 bitcoins at an average price of $112,351, resulting in a revenue of $64.71 million.

item.title: BitFuFu mined 467 Bitcoins in July, increasing its total holdings to 1784.
item.description: On August 5th, the mining firm BitFuFu presented its July 2025 operating report. The figures indicate that the company's total managed hash rate reached 38.6 EH/s, representing a 6.6% increase compared to the previous period. The total power capacity reached 752 megawatts, with a 3.3% growth compared to the previous period.In July, the company mined a total of 467 bitcoins, which was a 4.9% rise compared to the previous period. Among them, 384 were mined using cloud hash rate, and 83 were mined using self-owned hash rate. The latter witnessed a 43.1% increase compared to the previous period. As of July 31st, the company held 1,784 bitcoins.
